simplified: 虱子多了不痒，债多了不愁

pronunciation.pinyin: shī zi duō le bù yǎng , zhài duō le bù chóu
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shi1 zi5 duo1 le5 bu4 yang3 , zhai4 duo1 le5 bu4 chou2

details.simplified: 虱子多了不痒，债多了不愁
details.traditional: 虱子多了不癢，債多了不愁

meanings.value: lit. covered with lice, one doesn't feel the itching anymore; up to one's ears in debt, one ceases to worry about it
fig. to be past worrying (about sth)
